import React from 'react' import { reduxForm, Field } from 'redux-form' import { Input } from '../../common/FormsControls/Input' import { required, MinLength, MaxLength } from '../../../utils/Validators/validators' import "../../common/FormsControls/Form.css" import {Redirect} from 'react-router-dom' const MaxLengthCreator20=MaxLength(20) const MinLengthCreator5=MinLength(5) const RegisterForm=(props)=>{ if(props.isAuth) { return } return(
Not a member? Sign Up

Or

By joining I agree to receive emails from DressItBox

) } export const ReduxRegisterForm=reduxForm({ form:'register' })(RegisterForm)
